title: Tour de France peloton vows to bridge the gap to ‘two aliens’ Pogačar and Vingegaard
content:
Tadej Pogačar and Jonas Vingegaard are riding away from the pack in this Tour – here's how their rivals plan to catch back.

Read the full article at Tour de France peloton vows to bridge the gap to ‘two aliens’ Pogačar and Vingegaard on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
